'''Invoice of Goods Quantities''' is a [[Quest Items|quest item]] exclusive to the [[Commissions|commission]] ''[[So-Called Work]]'' and is obtained after reviewing all 3 goods on the ship.

This item will disappear from your inventory after reporting back to [[Linling]] after reviewing the goods on the cargo.
